title: MNF Recap; What is on your iPad? London Day 1
itunes:title: MNF Recap; What is on your iPad? London Day 1
description:
A stadium full of heroes- Dan Hanzus, Chris Wesseling, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal get to hang out in the beautiful Tottenham Hotspur stadium for a few minutes before the English skies decided to open up and rain on all of Ricky's equipment! Forgive any technical difficulties! The heroes recap Monday night football while Marc pouts (6:07) and then dissect the Jay Gruden firing. (19:31) The heroes talk about what would shock them on their ipad (if they just woke up from a 6 week nap) from NFL storylines happening going into week 6. (28:50) The heroes preview Thursday night game between the Patriots and Giants. (41:55)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
